description: Number of primes <= sum of first n primes.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) { default(primelimit, 3682913); n=0; s=0; forprime (p=2, prime(1000), s+=p; write("b061568.txt", n++, " ", primepi(s)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 24 2009]
author: _Harvey P. Dale_, May 18 2001
